data: PED inFLIXimab Rapid Infusion Once (Module)
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
For Crohn's Disease, Ulcerative Colitis, Inflammatory Bowel Disease-unclassified (Indeterminate Colitis), Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis, or Uveitis

Contraindications to rapid infusion of inFLIXimab:  -    Patient weight less than or equal to 12.5 kg  -    Previous infusion reaction or anaphylaxis to inFLIXimab  -    Receiving dose 1 to 4 today  -    Last dose was greater than 10 weeks ago
